h1. SMS C++ client

h2. Download the example

* If you installed git:  git clone git//github.com/h-t-ren/enrima-ws-gsoap-client.git
* If you haven't installed git: go to the webpage https://github.com/h-t-ren/enrima-ws-gsoap-client and click "zip" icon to download the example 


h2. Source code explanation

* stdsoap2.h and stdsoap2.cpp:  come from gsoap
* soapH.h, soapC.cpp, soapStub.h, soapenrimaSoap11Proxy.h and soapenrimaSoap11Proxy.cpp:  generated by gsoap
* main.cpp: the client application example

h2. compile and run the example

g++ -o enrima *.cpp (or: g++ -o enrima *.cpp -lsocket -lnsl)
./enrima

h2. Notes

You can also generate the source code by yourself:

* Download gsoap from http://sourceforge.net/projects/gsoap2/files/gSOAP/, please select gsoap_2.8.3.zip or above
* Unzip and install gsoap
  ./configure --prefix=$HOME/gsoap
  make
  make install
* Create enrima client test
  mkdir tst
  cp gsoap/{typemap.dat,stdsoap2.{h,cpp}} tst
  # generate enrima.h
  $HOME/bin/wsdl2h -o enrima.h -t typemap.dat http://www.ime.iiasa.ac.at/enrima_ws_tst1/enrima.wsdl
  # generate the Client-site *.h & *.cpp files
  $HOME/bin/soapcpp2 -C -i enrima.h -I $HOME/gsoap/share/gsoap/import/
